pkg.name: autocomplete
pkg.title: Autocomplete
pkg.description: Autocomplete, also known as type-ahead, uses predictive text to complete words as they are entered.

scope.title: Autocomplete
scope.description: Autocomplete, also known as type-ahead, uses predictive text to complete words as they are entered.

relatedComponents.name: combobox
relatedComponents.title: Combobox
relatedComponents.description: This component allows users to select from a list of options. It's especially useful when there are many options to choose from.

relatedComponents.title: Text input
relatedComponents.description: This component allows users to enter free-form text.
